section.title: Anyframe Builder
section.para: Anyframe Builder finds out Duplicated Query ID in Eclipse project and if duplicated Query ID exists, it shows red color Error mark at the Query statement of Query Manager Editor and shows the error to Proplems View in Eclipse.
Likewise, if a specific Query is not utilized in any DAO, yellow-color Warning mark is shown in Query Manager Editor and Problems View.

section.title: Condition for Anyframe Builder task
section.para: When Anyframe Query Manager Nature is applied to (activated; "Context Menu: Anyframe Query Manager > Add Anyframe Query Manager Nature") for the project, Anyframe Builder task is performed when the following conditions are satisfied.

listitem.para: When resource Add event occurred in project
When resource Update event occurred in project
When resource Delete event occurred in project
When Copy and Paste specific resource occurred from within project or outside
When Refresh Query Explorer View occurred

section.para: For all the cases above, "resource" means Mapping XML file, and Error or Warning marks do not go away until users directly solve the problems.
